scripts.build:server:win: node -e "try { require('fs').unlinkSync('build/launch.exe'); } catch (e) {}" && pkg src/server/index.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output build/launch.exe --config package.json
scripts.build:server:mac: node -e "try { require('fs').unlinkSync('build/server'); } catch (e) {}" && pkg src/server/index.js --targets node18-macos-x64 --output build/server --config package.json
scripts.build:win: npm run build && npm run build:server:win
scripts.build:mac: npm run build && npm run build:server:mac
